about.title: About me
about.description: Pleasure, I am Emanuel Gonçalves, married and Christian, Front End Enginner, enthusiast of Web Technologies, Accessibility and Semantic Web. I work as Software Developer in Decision6 - Store Flow. I have as hobbie the study in the area of Artificial Intelligence, especially Machine Learning. I recognize the role of Open Source and development communities and, whenever possible, participate in them, especially in the Telegram. I have as motto an African saying that says 'To go fast, go alone; to go far, go together'

project1.name: Acessibility for devs
project1.description: An website to learn about acessibitity. Aimed at the devs world, you'll find countless tips on how to make your site accessible. Approaches since good practices to references to W3C official documentation. The site is constantly growing, and as an Open Source project, it is always open to improvements and reviews.

project2.name: Como meu deputado foi eleito?
project2.description: Do you know the concept of 'puxadinho'? This project aims to bring quickly the information that Deputies were 'pulled' and which were elected by their own votes. The purpose is the user can search for yours candidates and have a summary of elections results, in 2018.

project3.name: Help-Me!
project3.description: I had the opportunity to put my knowledge into practice using Firebase, more precisely the Firestore, as well as the Quasar Framework, in this project. It is a system for registering problems that potentially will be appreciated by the IT Coordination of Unigranrio University, being possible to turn TCC or PCA (Curricular Articulator Project)

project4.name: Elections for Duque de Caxias City - 2016
project4.description: Was the opportunity to develop a Data Exploration Analysis project to elections for Mayor of Duque de Caxias. It was some cool discoveries. It was a first project using statistical knowledges, as well data exploratory. It was a oportunity to work with Python language

project5.name: ERSI - 2019
project5.description: An opportunity to be a part of the team that working on development of the site for the Escola Regional de Sistemas de Informação, an Sociedade Brasileira de Computação event, 2019 edition, which will be hosted at Unigranrio University, at Caxias

project6.name: Emilena Gonçalves - Professional page
project6.description: An opportunity to use React and Next in a project. I used Tailwind too. I developed the design and code. One more opportunity to work with Design and Code in the same project

project7.name: Star Wars - Planets Quiz
project7.description: More the oportunity to exercise my knowledge about Vue.js. This time, I built a quiz app about the characters and yours homeworlds in the Star Wars Universe. The data come from Star Wars API. I used the Tailwind.css and Jest to execute some tests in code.
